SEARCH
Package controller

Class AlbumListController

java.lang.Object
controller.AlbumListController
public class AlbumListController extends Object
AlbumListController class is the controller for the album list view. It allows the user to delete, rename, and create albums. It also allows the user to select an album to view its photos. It is used in the album list view.
Author:
jacobjude, ks1686
